::FireBlade::
FireBlade heard the boom of Quatro's smoke bomb. It has started he
said to himself as he transfomred from his tank and he unblended from
the scenery..He charged toward the base from the rear and started
blasting the side of the ship with his flame...'It should be a matter
of seconds before i can cut through this like butter'



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Quatro/Orchestra::
>
>     Quatro wouldn't wait any longer for escorts.  He activated a
tracking device, then used it to find Iron Raptor.  He walked up to
the door of her room, walked in slowly with a shadowy entrance.
>
>      "I am Quatro, universal bounty hunter.  I have come to hunt
down-" Quatro paused, and looked at the screen with the image of
Megatron being viewed.
>
>      Quatro would've continued, but then he would give away his
plans to kill Megatron.
>
>      "Iron Raptor, perhaps we can discuss this alliance later, I
have to be going.  And don't get in my way," Quatro warned.
>
>      Quatro looked at the screen.
>
>       "Later, Megabum," Quatro said, then continued heading out of
the CF.
>
>        Quatro was outside.  But he stopped and remained still.
There were bots here.  Quatro activated his tracking device.
>
>        "I'm picking up Decepticon signatures," Quatro said.
>
>        Quatro looked around.  He could see Autofire a little bit.
>
>        "Decepticon Autofire in sight range.  Threat level: 95%"
Quatro said data aloud.
>
>        Quatro grabbed a smoke bomb, and threw it over by Autofire
and whoever was with him.  Then, Quatro quickly fired a plasma-wave
from his gun in Autofire's direction.
>
>        Quatro opened his comm-link to all Maximals in and around CF.
>
>         "I've found some Decepticons hiding out here!" Quatro
shouted into it.
>
>          Quatro ran into the CF, ready to blast anything that
entered, namely, Decepticons or Preds.
